Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1040 WEST GEORGIA STREET,14TH FLOOR, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6E 4H1, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Northern Dynasty Minerals Ltd is a Canadian mineral exploration company. It has a single operating segment of acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. Its core asset is the Pebble Project located in Alaska, USA. The Pebble project is seeking to develop a significant deposit of copper, gold, molybdenum, and silver into a modern mining operation.
